text: Gu Jiahong (born 23 September 1961) is a Chinese rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of China Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Gu Jiahong
